item.title: NXT
item.description: score:69 Chances: Nextracker posted December quarter earnings results that topped views. Provider of intelligent solar tracker and software solutions topped quarterly estimates and lifted guidance. Nextracker Inc. beats earnings expectations. Reported EPS is $0.96, expectations were $0.49. Risks: NXT isnâ€™t one of the 30 most popular stocks among hedge funds at the end of the third quarter.
